duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a positive customer experience, ensuring all food orders are prepared to company standards, and working in various areas of the restaurant (Cashier, Front Counter, Dining Room, Kitchen, Food Prep, Grill, and Drive-Thru).
Thrive in an upbeat and fast-paced food service environment, working all shifts, including opening and closing shifts.
Maintain excellent verbal and written communication, ability to show up to scheduled shifts on time, and ability to clean tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant.
Take orders from customers, process payments efficiently, and follow proper safety procedures when handling and/or preparing food. Ability to multitask.
Provide quick and friendly service to all customers, work together as a team, and take initiative in compliance with Company policies.
